meanings.definition: Capable of being transferred or conveyed by will or inheritance.
meanings.sent1: The demisable property was left to me in my grandfather's will.
meanings.sent2: The demisable house was passed down through generations in the family.
meanings.sent3: I never knew a demisable item could hold so much sentimental value.
meanings.sent4: The demisable heirloom carried with it the weight of family history.
meanings.sent5: The demisable ring sparkled with memories of past generations.

meanings.definition: Capable of being leased or rented out.
meanings.sent1: The demisable apartment was quickly rented out to a new tenant.
meanings.sent2: The demisable office space was in high demand for lease.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to see how the demisable property attracted renters so easily.
meanings.sent4: The demisable storefront was like a revolving door of tenants.
meanings.sent5: The demisable car was leased out to tourists visiting the city.

meanings.definition: Capable of being passed down to heirs.
meanings.sent1: The demisable family heirloom was treasured by each new generation.
meanings.sent2: The demisable tradition of passing down stories kept the family connected.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to watch the demisable legacy unfold over time.
meanings.sent4: The demisable crown symbolized the rightful heir of the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The demisable property was a gift that kept on giving to future heirs.
